name: ASUS ROG Strix G16
subtitle: High-Performance Gaming Laptop with RTX 4070
description: The ASUS ROG Strix G16 delivers elite gaming performance with Intel Core i9 processor and NVIDIA RTX 4070 graphics. Designed for competitive gamers with advanced cooling and a 240Hz display.

name: MSI Raider GE78 HX
subtitle: Extreme Gaming Laptop with RTX 4090
description: Built for extreme gamers, the MSI Raider GE78 HX features RTX 4090 graphics, powerful Intel processor, RGB lightbar, and advanced cooling system.

name: NZXT H9 Flow
subtitle: Dual-Chamber Mid-Tower PC Case
description: The NZXT H9 Flow offers high airflow, dual-chamber design, and tempered glass panels for a clean and modern PC build.

name: Corsair
subtitle: High-Airflow ATX PC Case
description: Corsair 4000D Airflow is built for performance with optimized airflow design and cable management system.

name: Samsung Monitor
subtitle: 27-inch 240Hz Curved Gaming Monitor
description: Samsung Odyssey G7 offers ultra-fast 240Hz refresh rate, QHD resolution, and immersive 1000R curved display.

name: LG UltraGear 27GP850
subtitle: Nano IPS 165Hz Gaming Monitor
description: LG UltraGear 27GP850 features Nano IPS technology, 165Hz refresh rate, and 1ms response time for competitive gaming.

name: iPhone 15 Pro Max
subtitle: Titanium Flagship Smartphone
description: Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max features A17 Pro chip, titanium design, 48MP camera system, and ProMotion display.

name: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra
subtitle: AI-Powered Android Flagship
description: Galaxy S24 Ultra offers Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, 200MP camera, and advanced AI features with S Pen support.

name: Anker PowerCore 26800
subtitle: High Capacity Portable Power Bank
description: Anker PowerCore 26800mAh power bank supports fast charging with dual USB ports and high-speed output.

name: Apple iPad Pro M2
subtitle: 12.9-inch Liquid Retina XDR Tablet
description: iPad Pro M2 features Apple M2 chip, Liquid Retina XDR display, Apple Pencil support, and powerful productivity tools.
